Questionnairehttps://voicecollab.ai/fhir/Questionnaire/VbaiQuestionnaireConfoundersExample#0.1.0
smokingHave you ever smoked regularly (more than a few times a month for at least two months)? This includes tobacco, cannabis, vapes, e-cigarettes, hookah, or pipes.0..1stringOptions: 3 options
smoking_q2At what age did you start smoking?0..1stringEnable When: smoking = If I used to smoke OR I currently smoke
smoking_q3What age did you stop?0..1integerEnable When: smoking = If I used to smoke
smoking_q4Checklist of different types (choose all that apply):0..1stringEnable When: smoking = If I used to smoke OR I currently smoke
Options: 7 options
smoking_q5How often do/did you smoke?0..1stringEnable When: smoking = If I used to smoke OR I currently smoke
Options: 5 options
smoking_q6Have you been a regular smoker or not within the last 3 years?0..1stringOptions: 2 options
alcoholDo you drink alcohol?0..1stringOptions: 2 options
alcohol_q2How often do you have at least one drink containing alcohol? Drinks can be beer, wine, shots of liquor, cocktails containing a shot of liquor0..1stringEnable When: alcohol = If Yes
Options: 5 options
alcohol_q3How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when you are drinking? One drink is 12 oz. beer, 5 oz. wine, 1.5 oz. (one shot) liquor0..1integerEnable When: alcohol = If Yes
alcohol_q4How often do you have at least one drink containing alcohol? Drinks can be beer, wine, shots of liquor, cocktails containing a shot of liquor0..1stringEnable When: alcohol = If Yes
Options: 4 options
alcohol_q5Have you drunk alcohol today?0..1stringEnable When: alcohol = If Yes
Options: 2 options
alcohol_q6How many drinks did you have?0..1integerEnable When: alcohol_q5 = If Yes
alcohol_q7Have you ever required rehab/counseling for heavy alcohol use?0..1stringEnable When: alcohol = If Yes
Options: 2 options
alcohol_q8Are you currently in recovery for alcohol use?0..1stringEnable When: alcohol = If Yes
Options: 2 options
substance_useHow many times in the past year have you used a recreational substance or used a prescription medication for nonmedical reasons? (Recreational substances include methamphetamines (speed, crystal), cannabis (marijuana, pot), inhalants (paint thinner, aerosol, glue), tranquilizers (Valium), barbiturates, cocaine, ecstasy, hallucinogens (LSD, mushrooms), or narcotics (heroin). )0..1groupOptions: 2 options
substance_use_q2Are you currently in recovery for substance use? 0..1stringOptions: 2 options
substance_use_q3During the past TWO (2) WEEKS, about how often did you use any of the following medicines ON YOUR OWN, that is, without a doctorâ€™s prescription, in greater amounts or longer than prescribed? 0..1string
caffeineHow many 8 oz / 230 ml / small) cups of coffee OR shots of espresso OR caffeinated teas have you had today?0..1integer
hydrationHow many 8 oz / 230 ml / small) cups of water have you had today?0..1integer
hydration_underarm_sweatDo you experience underarm sweat?0..1stringOptions: 4 options
oral_dentalDo you have any oral or dental problems that might affect speech?0..1stringOptions: 2 options
oral_dental_q2Please specify ___. Do you currently have any tooth loss, dentures, retainers or braces? 0..1stringEnable When: oral_dental = If Yes
allergies_coldDo you currently have allergies or cold-like symptoms?0..1string
tirednessHow tired are you? (0=not tired at all, 10=extremely tired)0..1integer
heightWhat is your height? (ft/m)0..1integer
weightWhat is your weight? (lbs/kg)0..1integer
ent_historyDo you have any of these voice, communication, or hearing conditions or had any of the interventions mentioned below? (check all that apply) 0..1stringOptions: 68 options
ent_history_q2Do you currently have these conditions or currently experience symptoms as a result of having had these conditions or interventions? 0..1stringEnable When: ent_history = If != None
Options: 3 options
ent_history_q3Which ones do you currently have?0..1stringEnable When: ent_history_q2 = only some
ent_history_q4Do you currently receive treatment for these conditions?0..1stringOptions: 3 options
ent_history_q5Which ones do you currently receive treatment for?0..1stringEnable When: ent_history_q4 = only some
neurological_historyHave you been diagnosed with any of these neurological health conditions by a clinician? (check all that apply) 0..1stringOptions: 15 options
neurological_history_q2Do you currently have these conditions or currently experience symptoms as a result of having had these conditions? 0..1stringEnable When: neurological_history = !=None
Options: 3 options
neurological_history_q3Which ones do you currently have? 0..1stringEnable When: neurological_history_q2 = only some
psychiatric_historyPsychiatric conditions: Have you been diagnosed with any of these mental health conditions by a clinician? (check all that apply) 0..1stringOptions: 21 options
psychiatric_history_q2Do you currently have these conditions? 0..1stringEnable When: psychiatric_history = !=None
Options: 3 options
psychiatric_history_q3Which ones do you currently have?0..1stringEnable When: psychiatric_history_q2 = Only Some
psychiatric_history_q4Do you currently receive treatment for these conditions?0..1stringEnable When: psychiatric_history_q2 = Only Some
Options: 2 options
physical_health_whodas_2In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in:0..1group
S1Standing for long periods such as 30 minutes?0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
S2Taking care of your household responsibilities?0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
S3Learning a new task, for example, learning how to get to a new place?0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
S4How much of a problem did you have joining in community activities (for example, festivities, religious or other activities) in the same way as anyone else can?0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
S5How much have you been emotionally affected by your health problems?0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
S6Concentrating on doing something for ten minutes?0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
S7Walking a long distance such as a kilometre [or equivalent]?0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
S8Washing your whole body?0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
S9Getting dressed?0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
S10Dealing with people you do not know?0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
S11Maintaining a friendship?0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
S12Your day-to-day work?0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
H1Overall, in the past 30 days, how many days were these difficulties present?0..1integer
H2In the past 30 days, for how many days were you totally unable to carry out your0..1integer
H3In the past 30 days, not counting the days that you were totally unable, for how many days did you cut back or reduce your usual activities or work because of any health condition?0..1integer
medicationDo you currently take or use any of these medications or substances? Please check all that apply0..1stringOptions: 11 options
medication_please_specifyPlease specify ___. 0..1stringEnable When: medication = If Other
menstration_menopauseDo you menstruate?0..1stringOptions: 4 options
menstration_menopause_please_specifyPlease specify ___. 0..1stringEnable When: menstration_menopause = If Other
vocal_activityDo you do one of these jobs or hobbies that requires using your voice for many hours a day (check all that apply): 0..1stringOptions: 8 options
vocal_activity_not_NoneHow many hours per day do you do this activity with a loud voice or in a loud environment that requires elevating your voice (for instance, a noisy bar or a noisy classroom)?0..1stringEnable When: menstration_menopause = If != None
reading_abilityHow good do you think you are at reading out loud in [English/Spanish/French], that is reading out loud without making mistakes and understanding what you read at a normal rate?0..1stringOptions: 5 options
